title: Risk bundles
balance_tooltip: The balance is the total amount of tokens in the bundle
capacity_tooltip: The capacity is the amount of tokens available to new protections
locked_tooltip: The locked capital is the amount of tokens that are currently used by active protections
supported_capital_tooltip: The supported capital is the total amount of tokens that are available due to staking
supported_capital_remaining_tooltip: The remaining supported capital is the amount of tokens that are available due to staking and not yet used by active protections
checkbox_t_and_c_label: By checking this box, I confirm that I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.
